name: MonoDevelop
description: MonoDevelop is a cross-platform IDE, which is mainly used to develop Mono and .NET Framework software. It integrates many characteristics of Eclipse and Microsoft Visual Studio.

en_US.description: MonoDevelop is a cross-platform IDE, which is mainly used to develop Mono and .NET Framework software. It integrates many characteristics of Eclipse and Microsoft Visual Studio.
en_US.name: MonoDevelop

zh_CN.description: MonoDevelop是个跨平台的集成开发环境，主要用来开发Mono与.NETFramework软件。MonoDevelop集成了很多Eclipse与MicrosoftVisual Studio的特性。
zh_CN.name: MonoDevelop
